item.description:
Beat the 90 Degrees Heat! Come enjoy the Stix Patio Party this Friday with your favorite drink in hand or your choice of flavored Hookahs with Friends! Free entrance to the Patio all Night Long!

Get ready to Dance!! 2 Floors, 2 DJ's..Just 1 place to be..STIX restaurant and Lounge!

Upstairs: Dj 7 - Spinning International, House, Hip-Hop and Top40!

Downstairs: Dj Sanath from the Chak de Boston Cruise! - Top 40, Desi, Bhangra, Bollywood, Mashups!

21+ Event. $10 on guestlist. RSVP here, call Jeet: 617-216-1492 or email: jeet.shahani@gmail.com

http://www.stixboston...
item.name: Hookah Party - Patio Party - Sangria - Hookah. Patio
